name: Beatvival
description:
The game is made for Mix and Game Jam

Protect your campfire from zombie invadors who try to destroy it by playing to the beat. 

Zombies are comming from left and right towards your campfire. You must stop them before they get near the campfire. Campfire has 3 stages (lives) when 3 zombies get to the fire it's over. Press Shift to switch between walking and fighting modes.

* BUG: You must stand on the left side of the zombie to damage it.
